scripts.build: pnpm start-maven-repo && pnpm image-build; pnpm stop-maven-repo
scripts.image-build: docker build --build-arg BAMOE_MAVEN_REPO_URL=$(docker inspect -f '{{range.NetworkSettings.Networks}}{{.IPAddress}}{{end}}' bamoe-maven-repo) -t quay.io/thiagoelg/dev-deployment-kogito-blank-app-with-dev-ui:latest -f Containerfile .
